cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joubu

sentence.kanji: 祖母は身体が丈夫だ。
sentence.romaji: sobo ha karada ga joubu da
sentence.english: My grandmother is physically strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saichuu

sentence.kanji: 夕食の最中に電話がかかってきたの。
sentence.romaji: yuushoku no saichuu ni denwa ga kakate kita no
sentence.english: I got a phone call in the middle of supper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikidomari

sentence.kanji: ここから先は行き止まりです。
sentence.romaji: koko kara saki ha ikidomari desu
sentence.english: It is a dead-end ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenryoku

sentence.kanji: 全力で走れ。
sentence.romaji: zenryoku de hashire
sentence.english: Run with all your might!

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saishou

sentence.kanji: これは世界で最小のコンピューターです。
sentence.romaji: kore ha sekai de saishou no konpyu-ta- desu
sentence.english: This is the smallest computer in the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denryoku

sentence.kanji: このエアコンはあまり電力を使いません。
sentence.romaji: kono eakon ha amari denryoku wo tsukaimasen
sentence.english: This air conditioner doesn't use much electricity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saijou

sentence.kanji: このホテルでは最上のサービスが受けられます。
sentence.romaji: kono hoteru de ha saijou no sa-bisu ga ukeraremasu
sentence.english: You can get the best service at this hotel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machiawase

sentence.kanji: 明日の待ち合わせは11時です。
sentence.romaji: asu no machiawase ha 11 ji desu
sentence.english: Tomorrow we'll meet at 11 o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toho

sentence.kanji: 家から駅まで徒歩3分です。
sentence.romaji: ie kara eki made toho 3 pun desu
sentence.english: It's 3 minutes on foot from home to the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karyoku

sentence.kanji: 火力を弱めないと肉がこげるよ。
sentence.romaji: karyoku wo yowamenai to niku ga kogeru yo
sentence.english: The meat's going to burn if you don't lower the heat.

cards.english: just can't wait for, long for
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machidooshii

sentence.kanji: 入学式が待ち遠しいです。
sentence.romaji: nyuugakushiki ga machidooshii desu
sentence.english: I can't wait for the entrance ceremony.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nokori

sentence.kanji: 仕事の残りは家でします。
sentence.romaji: shigoto no nokori ha ie de shimasu
sentence.english: I'll do the rest of the work at home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torikesu

sentence.kanji: ホテルの予約を取り消したよ。
sentence.romaji: hoteru no yoyaku wo torikeshita yo
sentence.english: I canceled our hotel reservation.

cards.english: be of use, serve a purpose
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakudatsu

sentence.kanji: 学校で勉強したことが役立った。
sentence.romaji: gakou de benkyou shita koto ga yakudata
sentence.english: What I studied at school was useful.

cards.english: relay a message, transfer a call
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toritsugu

sentence.kanji: 電話があったら取り次いでください。
sentence.romaji: denwa ga atara toritsuide kudasai
sentence.english: Please transfer the phone to me if it rings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakume

sentence.kanji: 私は無事に役目を終えたよ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha buji ni yakume wo oeta yo
sentence.english: I completed the duties without incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tetsudou

sentence.kanji: 日本は鉄道がとても発達しています。
sentence.romaji: nipon ha tetsudou ga totemo hatatsu shite imasu
sentence.english: The railway system in Japan is well developed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shutsuryoku

sentence.kanji: このプリンターで写真を出力できます。
sentence.romaji: kono purinta- de shashin wo shutsuryoku dekimasu
sentence.english: You can output pictures with this printer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masaichuu

sentence.kanji: 今は試験の真っ最中です。
sentence.romaji: ima ha shiken no masaichuu desu
sentence.english: I'm right in the middle of examinations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machiaishitsu

sentence.kanji: 待合室はとても込んでいたよ。
sentence.romaji: machiaishitsu ha totemo konde ita yo
sentence.english: The waiting room was very crowded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuuryoku

sentence.kanji: 彼女の仕事はデータの入力です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no shigoto ha de-ta no nyuuryoku desu
sentence.english: Her job is inputting data.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toriireru

sentence.kanji: 彼は新しいアイデアをすぐ取り入れます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha atarashii aidea wo sugu toriiremasu
sentence.english: He's quick to adopt new ideas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torikaesu

sentence.kanji: 彼はチャンピオンのタイトルを取り返したね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chanpion no taitoru wo torikaeshita ne
sentence.english: He took back the championship title.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machiawaseru

sentence.kanji: 彼と新宿で待ち合わせました。
sentence.romaji: kare to shinjuku de machiawasemashita
sentence.english: I met him in Shinjuku.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's baibai

sentence.kanji: 彼は不動産の売買をしています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fudousan no baibai wo shite imasu
sentence.english: He buys and sells real estate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's motomo

sentence.kanji: 彼は世界で最も早い男です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sekai de motomo hayai otoko desu
sentence.english: He's the fastest man in the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yukue

sentence.kanji: 彼の行方が分かりません。
sentence.romaji: kare no yukue ga wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't know his whereabouts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saikou

sentence.kanji: これまでで最高の結果が出たよ。
sentence.romaji: koremade de saikou no keka ga deta yo
sentence.english: I got my best results so far.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyou

sentence.kanji: 5行以内で答えを書いてください。
sentence.romaji: gogyou inai de kotae wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your answer within five lines.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's danshi

sentence.kanji: 男子はこっちに並んで。
sentence.romaji: danshi ha kochi ni narande
sentence.english: Boys line up here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shibou

sentence.kanji: その事故では2人死亡したの。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko de ha futari shibou shita no
sentence.english: Two people died in that accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toriageru

sentence.kanji: 危ないので子供からライターを取り上げました。
sentence.romaji: abunai no de kodomo kara raita- wo toriagemashita
sentence.english: The lighter was taken from the child because it was dangerous.

cards.english: collection of data, gathering of news
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuzai

sentence.kanji: テレビも取材に来たほど有名なレストランです。
sentence.romaji: terebi mo shuzai ni kita hodo yuumei na resutoran desu
sentence.english: The restaurant is so famous that the TV news ran a story on it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suiryoku

sentence.kanji: この島は発電を水力に頼っているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kono shima ha hatsuden wo suiryoku ni tayote iru n da
sentence.english: This island relies on hydroelectric energy to generate power.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sansei

sentence.kanji: 私は彼の意見に賛成だ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no iken ni sansei da
sentence.english: I agree with his opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shipai

sentence.kanji: 一度の失敗であきらめてはいけないよ。
sentence.romaji: ichido no shipai de akirameteha ikenai yo
sentence.english: You must not give up after one setback.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genshiryoku

sentence.kanji: 原子力の安全な利用について考えましょう。
sentence.romaji: genshiryoku no anzen na riyou ni tsuite kangaemashou
sentence.english: Let's think about the safe use of nuclear power.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichijou

sentence.kanji: 音楽は私の日常の一部です。
sentence.romaji: ongaku ha watashi no nichijou no ichibu desu
sentence.english: Music is a part of my daily life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joushiki

sentence.kanji: そんなの常識だよ。
sentence.romaji: sonna no joushiki da yo
sentence.english: That is common sense.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hishini

sentence.kanji: 必死に単語を暗記したよ。
sentence.romaji: hishini tango wo anki shita yo
sentence.english: I struggled to memorize the words.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyousei

sentence.kanji: 年金問題は行政の最大の課題のひとつよ。
sentence.romaji: nenkin mondai ha gyousei no saidai no kadai no hitotsu yo
sentence.english: The pension problem is one of the current administration's biggest issues.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuryoku

sentence.kanji: あの都市はオリンピックの有力な候補地です。
sentence.romaji: ano toshi ha orinpiku no yuuryoku na kouhochi desu
sentence.english: That city is a strong candidate to host the Olympics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinkou

sentence.kanji: 学会は予定通りに進行しています。
sentence.romaji: gakai ha yotei doori ni shinkou shite imasu
sentence.english: The academic conference is proceeding as scheduled.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koushin

sentence.kanji: 開会式で選手たちが行進しました。
sentence.romaji: kaikaishiki de senshutachi ga koushin shimashita
sentence.english: Players paraded at the opening ceremony.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyougi

sentence.kanji: 委員会はその問題について協議しましたわ。
sentence.romaji: iinkai ha sono mondai ni tsuite kyougi shimashita wa
sentence.english: The committee discussed the issue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokutetsu

sentence.kanji: 父は以前、国鉄に勤めていました。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha izen kokutetsu ni tsutomete imashita
sentence.english: My father used to work for Japan National Railways.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oubo

sentence.kanji: 求人に多数の応募があった。
sentence.romaji: kyuujin ni tasuu no oubo ga ata
sentence.english: There were a lot of applications for the job opening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boshuu

sentence.kanji: 私の会社で社員を募集しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi no kaisha de shain wo boshuu shite imasu
sentence.english: My company is recruiting new staff.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuin

sentence.kanji: ここは職員専用の出入り口です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha shokuin senyou no deiriguchi desu
sentence.english: This is an entrance for staff only.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuwawaru

sentence.kanji: 私たちのチームに彼が加わった。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi no chi-mu ni kare ga kuwawata
sentence.english: He joined our team.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iikagen

sentence.kanji: いい加減なことを言ってはいけません。
sentence.romaji: iikagen na koto wo ite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You shouldn't say thoughtless things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uketori

sentence.kanji: 受け取りに判子をお願いします。
sentence.romaji: uketori ni hanko wo onegai shimasu
sentence.english: Please stamp your seal on the receipt.
